name: Postman Jr.
description: A game for children. The essence of the game: playing as the junior postman, collect all the mail envelopes to open the door and go to the next level. The game also has bonus levels where you need to choose the correct mathematical answer. Feel free to rate the game and leave comments. The game is free, donation is optional, but if you want, I will not mind, thank you very much :) --------------------------------------------------------- Game controls: ← - move left → - move right ↑ - jump Z - action mouse --------------------------------------------------------- Special thanks to all the guys who share their assets !!! Graphics: *GrafxKid *FartFish Music: *MightyJor ---------------------------------------------------------
